title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 521.12 - Conflicts of interest
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 521.12 - Conflicts of interest

State Regulations
(a) No person who
is a director, officer or employee of the applicant or an officer or employee
of the State and no firm, organization, corporation, or partnership in which
any such person, his or her spouse, children, or parents has any interest, direct or indirect, may receive, by contract or otherwise, funds granted by the

State. (b) Upon the written request
by the applicant the OMH may waive the provisions of subdivision (a) of this
section by giving prior written approval after full disclosure of all relevant
facts and circumstances. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
521.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
